experience.description:
I have been working as a Frontend developer over the last 8 months in an internship program at company Fullstack Development (FSD), have been led by a professional mentor & now looking for a React Developer position to continue my growth as a developer. Experienced in building SPA-s with React, and also apps with Typescript.
Links to my portfolio can be found below.
PORTFOLIO EXAMPLES:
1) A food delivery service SPA built with React, with ability to authenticate user, place orders, modify cart, send orders to server (depending on user auth). App state is connected with LocalStorage (to allow app refreshing), with currency rates API, uuid & routing (React): 
https://evening-savannah-63598.herokuapp.com
2) A light-weight responsive Portfolio page (Javascript, Scss, bundled with create-react-app):
https://pacific-beach-71437.herokuapp.com
3) An МVС-app written with Typescript, showing configurable range sliders, covered with unit tests (Typescript / Javascript, Jest, Webpack bundle):
demo: https://pyrocoder.github.io/slidesapp/dist/index.html
code: https://github.com/pyrocoder/slidesapp
4) A responsive website with many components & plugins, jQuery plugins, using BEM & other coding standards . You could particularly check out the complex Dropdown component here written in vanilla JS (Javascript, Scss, Pug, jQuery, Webpack pug-multipage config):
demo: http://pyrocoder.github.io/toxiin/dist/index.html
code: https://github.com/pyrocoder/toxiin
5) A commercial (freelance) project (Scss, Pug, Javascript):
https://pyrocoder.github.io/lotos-cleaning
6) Another commercial (freelance) project (Sass):
https://pyrocoder.github.io/wind-forte
SKILLS:
- React
- Typescript / Javascript
- HTML5 / Pug, CSS3 / SASS
- BEM, best practices & coding standards, responsiveness
- Jest (unit testing)
- Webpack / Gulp / Parcel
- Node JS, Git, Heroku, WebStorm, Figma, Photoshop
- Fluent English
- A 10 year management experience, financial management knowledge, analytical thinking

RESPONSIBILITIES: 
 
 
1) Purchasing: 
- the search for new suppliers, the conclusion of contracts with suppliers, the formation of long-term trusting relationships with key suppliers of goods and services (transport) 
- placing orders, controlling the cost of purchased goods, obtaining discounts from suppliers, agreeing on the best working conditions (deferring payments, shipments at the expense of the supplier, obtaining lower price levels) 
 - work with complaints, control of settlements with suppliers 
 
2) Transport logistics: 
- ensuring uninterrupted and timely deliveries of current needs for goods (orders for customers), including express deliveries with a delivery time of 5 working days 
- planning of shipments and optimization of supply chains in order to reduce the cost of goods taking into account the specified delivery time, including improving the quality of work with existing carriers, and the search for new ones. 
 - coordination of the work of carriers, customs declarants and temporary storage warehouses 
 
3) Warehouse logistics: 
- analysis of the need for goods in order to ensure availability in the warehouse at a given level for key segments of the range 
 
4) Human Resources: 
- training, motivation and control of employees in submission 
 
***************************************************** 
 
PROGRESS: 
 
Contributed to the growth of the Company's income to 30%: 
 
1) Increased the effectiveness of interaction with partners and departments within the company; improved the quality of tasks, while reducing the time for their implementation, thanks to the implementation of the learning process, a system of motivation and optimization of business processes 
 
2) Reduced purchase prices from key suppliers to 20%, and transportation costs - up to 50%, as a result of negotiations and the maintenance of trusting relationships with partners 
 
3) Reduced the cost of purchased goods to 20%, and delivery time - from 25 to 10 days, due to the optimization of supply chains, supply chains and customs clearance 
 
4) Minimized the number of complaints on purchased goods to 90%, due to improved quality of tasks, as well as negotiations with suppliers

RESPONSIBILITIES: 
 
Managing a 3-person department, planning shipments, working with suppliers, concluding contracts, placing orders, controlling the cost of purchased goods, obtaining discounts from suppliers, agreeing on the best working conditions, transport logistics, working with complaints, controlling settlements, tracking orders, analyzing the need for goods , work with customs brokers, optimization of business processes.

Tracking container deliveries of raw materials for our own production (cutting, processing of packaging film), placing orders with suppliers, maintaining business relations with suppliers, transport companies, working with customs brokers.
Photo processing in Photoshop, preparation for printing (color correction, photo recovery, graphic design), printing photos on prof. equipment.
